channel.title: Latest Stackstorm Docker Image Ubuntu:bionic
channel.description:
I am looking for Ubuntu 18.04 / 16.04 (bionic/xenial) support in the st2-docker image...it seems there is not upgrade in st2-docker since ubuntu 14.04 (trusty).
I found some docker files for stackstorm-ha, https://github.com/StackStorm/st2-dockerfiles. but couldn't find the complete stackstorm community setup with latest ubuntu 16.04/18.04 supported.
thanks

item.title: Latest Stackstorm Docker Image Ubuntu:bionic
item.dc:creator: manoj-aps
item.description:
I am looking for Ubuntu 18.04 / 16.04 (bionic/xenial) support in the st2-docker image…it seems there is not upgrade in st2-docker since ubuntu 14.04 (trusty).

I found some docker files for stackstorm-ha, GitHub - StackStorm/st2-dockerfiles: StackStorm Community Dockerfiles (one-service-per-container) used to build and push images to the StackStorm registry, used in 'stackstorm-ha' K8s Helm chart. but couldn’t find the complete stackstorm community setup with latest ubuntu 16.04/18.04 supported.

thanks
